ai-snp1.11:1.3_0: if she urges her on, bends back;
ai-snp1.11:1.4_0: this is the field for the body.
ai-snp1.11:2.1_0: Bones and sinews conjoined, smeared with skin and flesh,
ai-snp1.11:2.4_0: the Realized One does not truly see,
ai-snp1.11:3.1_0: Full of intestines, full of undigested food, having a lumpy liver, a bladder,
ai-snp1.11:3.2_0: The group of nine on the cloth
ai-snp1.11:4.4_0: would live for a drinking goal,
ai-snp1.11:6.1_0: mucus from the nose, from the mouth vomit is
ai-snp1.11:8.2_0: bloated, discoloured, having become quite rotten.
ai-snp1.11:8.4_0: if she is not seeking for relatives;
ai-snp1.11:9.1_0: Dogs, hyenas, wolves and worms eat it,
ai-snp1.11:9.2_0: jackals and frogs, what am I?
ai-snp1.11:9.4_0: and other creatures who live there.
ai-snp1.11:10.2_0: Here a monk endowed with wisdom
ai-snp1.11:10.4_0: Even when you see what’s true is true,
ai-snp1.11:11.1_0: As this is, so is that;
ai-snp1.11:11.2_0: as that is, so is this.
ai-snp1.11:11.4_0: for the body, having dispelled desire for the body.
ai-snp1.11:12.2_0: Here a monk endowed with wisdom
ai-snp1.11:12.3_0: has passed over to the deathless peace.
ai-snp1.11:13.1_0: two-legged body is dirty and stinking,
ai-snp1.11:13.3_0: full of flocks of many corpses full.
ai-snp1.11:14.2_0: like the rain cloud on the spot,
ai-snp1.11:14.4_0: What is that but not seeing,
